title: Level2 Flux Gate Magnetometer Burst DC Magnetic Field for MMS Satellite Number 4 - J. Burch, C. Russell, W. Magnus (SWRI, UCLA, IWF)

info.x_cadence_note: Cadence based on variable 'Epoch' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/mms/mms4/fgm/brst/l2/2015/09/mms4_fgm_brst_l2_20150901121114_v4.18.0.cdf. This most common cadence occurred for 57.4240% of the 42631 timesteps. Cadence = 7812595 [ns] = PT0.007813S.
info.contact: J. Burch, C. Russell, W. Magnus @ SWRI, UCLA, IWF

parameters.name: mms4_fgm_b_gse_brst_l2_clean
parameters.description: Magnetic field vector in Geocentric Solar Ecliptic (GSE) cartesian coordinates plus Btotal (128 S/s). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_esa_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['mms4_fgm_b_gse_brst_l2', 'mms4_fgm_flag_brst_l2']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: Magnetic field vector in GSE plus Btotal (128 S/s)

parameters.name: mms4_fgm_b_gse_brst_l2
parameters.description: ---> Magnetic field vector in Geocentric Solar Ecliptic (GSE) cartesian coordinates plus Btotal (8 or 16 S/s), including flagged data
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: Magnetic field vector in GSE plus Btotal (128 S/s)
